resources.string: How often do you consume meat?
How often do you use a car?
How often do you buy new clothes?
How often do you turn on the heating/cooling?
How often do you eat take-out?
How often a year do you fly?
How often do you take hot showers?
replace plastic water bottles with reusable \ncreate a compost bin for your house/dorm to place food scraps \nlearn easy, healthy recipes to avoid take-out waste
reduce consumption of meat and dairy products \ntry advocating for campus-wide Meatless Mondays \nfocus on limiting dine-in/take-out meals and shift toward cooking at home
try walking or biking to destinations <2 miles away \nresearch alternatives for airplane trips (trains, buses, car-shares) \navoid online delivery purchase and try to consume locally
replace old light-bulbs with energy-efficient alternatives \nencourage turning lights and appliances off when not in use \nswitch to cooler showers
